channel.title: Can you make a wallpaper that changes picture?
channel.description: hey i was wondering if there was a way to make your wallpaper for you desktop to change micture every like few minutes or so kind of like a screen saver does?

item.title: Can you make a wallpaper that changes picture?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Look for a program that lets you make .gifs, these are animated images that can be set as your desktop. Here’s a quick link I found: http://www.5star-shareware.com/Windows/Graphics/Image-Animation/gifcon.html

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make a wallpaper that changes picture?

item.title: Can you make a wallpaper that changes picture?
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

Yes. Try using an animated program and then setting it as your background.
